title: Leading baby wipes vendors in the U.S. 2016 , based on sales
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Companys.
Company Private label has the highest Million U.S. dollars and Irish Breeze has the lowest Million U.S. dollars.
The highest Company Private label has 490.0 more Million U.S. dollars than the lowest Company Irish Breeze.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Companys.
The Million U.S. dollars is highest at Company Private label and lowest at Company Irish Breeze.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Million U.S. dollars for 10 number of Companys.
Company Private label has the highest Million U.S. dollars and Irish Breeze has the lowest Million U.S. dollars.
The highest Company Private label has 490.0 more Million U.S. dollars than the lowest Company Irish Breeze.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Million U.S. dollars is highest at Company Private label and lowest at Company Irish Breeze.
The difference of Million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 490.0.
Million U.S. dollars at Company Private label is 494.4 , second place is Kimberly Clark Corp. at 416.2, and thirdly is Procter & Gamble at 276.6.
Considered together, the average Million U.S. dollars in all 10 Companys is roughly 123.5.
